titleStmt.title: The cabal of several notorious priests and Jesuits discovered, as, William Ireland, Tho. White ... William Harcourt ... John Fenwick ... John Gaven ... and Anthony Turner, &c. : shewing their endeavors to subvert the government, and Protestant religion ... / by a lover of his King and countrey, who formerly was an eye-witness of these things.
titleStmt.author: Lover of his King and countrey.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
